item.description:
Music not loud, pleasent atmosphere, easy to talk.

Enjoy a drink at the outdoor patio or at the lounge.

Comfortable seating and special Belly dancing performance this Friday w/belly Dancers Nadira and Saima and Traditional Drummer. Ask for Jeet at the Door. Tell him Ravi send you.

Location:
Vintage Lounge, 72 Broad St. Entrance is at the intersection of Customhouse Rd and Broad St.

Cost $10 at the door.
item.how_to_find_us: Will be hanging out at the bar in a black shirt. Not hard to miss.
item.name: Belly Dancing Social Meetup
